question: How can I register my business on Stampd?
answer: To join Stampd, navigate to the Stampd console by clicking on Try Now and follow the registration process. Once completed, you'll be directed to your dashboard.

question: How do I create a loyalty card for my business on Stampd?
answer: Navigate to the "Cards" section in the Stampd console. Here, you can create personalized loyalty cards by adding your business logos, choosing card backgrounds, and selecting a theme that resonates with your brand.

question: Can I customize multiple loyalty card designs for my business on Stampd?
answer: Absolutely! In the "Cards" section, you have the flexibility to design multiple loyalty cards. Choose the ones you wish to make active and visible to clients.

question: How do I activate a loyalty card for clients to see on Stampd?
answer: After creating a loyalty card, click on the 3 dots on the top right corner of the card and set it as active to make it visible to clients. This ensures that clients can start adding the card to their Stampd app.

question: Are QR codes automatically generated for my business on Stampd?
answer: Yes, QR codes for adding your loyalty card to clients and for adding stamps are automatically generated upon registering with Stampd. You can find and manage these QR codes in the dedicated "QR Codes" section.

question: How can I keep track of QR codes for my loyalty program on Stampd?
answer: Access the "QR Codes" section in the Stampd console to view and manage the QR codes associated with your loyalty program. Keep this information confidential, especially the QR code for adding stamps.

question: Can I update my loyalty card designs or create new ones later on Stampd?
answer: Absolutely! Feel free to revisit the "Cards" section to update existing loyalty card designs or create new ones. You can set them as active whenever you choose to make them visible to clients.

question: Where can I find statistics and insights about my business on Stampd?
answer: Your business statistics are conveniently displayed on the dashboard. Track the performance of your loyalty program and make informed decisions to enhance customer engagement.

question: Is Stampd currently a free service?
answer: Yes, as of now, Stampd is entirely free for users to enjoy its features and benefits.

question: Will Stampd remain free in the future?
answer: There is a possibility that Stampd's pricing model may change in the future, depending on the user volume and other factors.

question: How will I be notified if Stampd transitions to a subscription-based model?
answer: If there are changes to Stampd's pricing model, we will notify all users through the app and other communication channels well in advance to provide transparency and ample time for adjustments.
